For Eg: markwood@some_email.com ​ Response description 200 Error response ​ name string Application name ​ icon string Application icon ​ description string Application description ​ auth_type string Authentication type supported by the app ​ type string Application type ​ app_id string Application record id ​ tags array Array of application tags. ​ version object Version object Show properties ​ _v string Application version ​ description string version description ​ connected boolean This field is present only if an app has been connected. This field provides information whether the app has been integrated by the linked account ​ connected_accounts array This field provides description of the account connected. Present only if an app has been connected. Show properties ​ identifier string identifier of the account connected with the app ​ connectedAt date Time of last connection ​ auth_input_map array This field is present only if auth_type is keybased . Provides the input field details to be shown to the linked account for app connection. Show properties ​ name string Field name ​ label string Field label ​ placeholder string Field placeholder ​ required boolean If the field is a required field ​ type string Type of the input field.
